Smart Fridge: Create a refrigerator that can detect and analyze the food inside it, providing users with personalized nutrition and meal planning recommendations based on their dietary needs and preferences. The fridge could also use AI-powered image recognition to identify and suggest recipes based on the ingredients it detects. Confidence score: 0.8

Energy-Efficient Fridge: Design a refrigerator that harnesses the power of renewable energy sources such as solar or wind power to reduce its carbon footprint. The fridge could also use advanced insulation materials to minimize energy consumption. Confidence score: 0.9

Modular Fridge: Create a refrigerator that is composed of interchangeable modules, allowing users to customize the size, shape, and features of their fridge to suit their needs. The modules could be easily swapped out as needed, reducing waste and making the fridge more sustainable. Confidence score: 0.8

Smart Food Management: Develop a refrigerator that can track and manage food expiration dates, automatically alerting users when food is nearing its expiration date. The fridge could also use AI-powered algorithms to suggest recipes and meal plans based on the food items it detects. Confidence score: 0.9

Emotive Fridge: Create a refrigerator that can detect and respond to a user's emotions, such as displaying a happy face when a user opens the fridge to see a full shelf of healthy food. The fridge could also use AI-powered voice assistants to provide encouragement and support to users in their health and wellness goals. Confidence score: 0.9
